middle.bigIntro1: Hello, I started programming for money but grew to enjoy it as well. So win, win! I studied it for four years and have gone through an internship too.
middle.bigIntro2: My greatest strengths focus on all things front-end and database related. However, I have ample experience with the backend as well. In my free time, I like reading novels, and I do try to write them myself. I am as thorough with my code as with any word I read or write for the sake of my art.
middle.experienceExplanation1: - I spent 6 months in an internship in the company SIA 'ETEKOS' where I made both the full front-end and some backend for multiple websites. This was also the time I earned experience working in a team with other interns
middle.experienceExplanation2: - Front-end: HTML, CSS, javascript, typescript and React on multiple projects. For front-end designs, I used Figma, Tailwind CSS and Sass
middle.experienceExplanation3: - Back-end: javascript and php, along with MySQL on phpMyAdmin
middle.experienceExplanation4: - Minor note: C++ and C#, the latter of which I used for Unity
middle.experienceExplanation5: - Finally, all my projects and code are available to view on Github. (See in the Contact section)
middle.project1Explanation: A solo project webpage created just for the design using React, javascript and Tailwind CSS. I was provided with a sample and perfectly recreated it, animations and all.
middle.project2Explanation: A solo project website composed of five different lists, a .pdf reader and user accounts, made using a full front-end with animations and PHP backend alongside javascript and an SQL database.
middle.project3Explanation: A team project made with two others, where we added to a provided webpage the ability to pull search results for other websites from an api, using only that webpage's link.
middle.project4Explanation: Made for fun with javascript and simple css. A true, undisputable masterpiece.
